name: Toys of War
description: The greatest military minds have gathered in an underground bunker to plan their next move. Take control of miniature military vehicles and battle your friends across a range of unique game modes. Plans are useful but it's quick thinking and a keen eye that will win the battle in Toys of War.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.40Ghz Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 520 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
